message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique item that I believe would greatly enhance your lifestyle. Given its exceptional quality and features, I'm extending this opportunity to you at an introductory price of $85. I hope you find it as valuable as I do.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $75?

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to meet you halfway. I propose an offer of $80 for the product. I believe this price reflects both the value of the product and your budget considerations.
